content:
Considering the Target Audience and Information about myself, give me a topic outline for the topic heading "Design Changes: How to Ensure that Your Construction Project Runs Smoothly
". The article should appeal to the Target Audience who are currently experiencing delays in building or renovation of the residential home. 

I also want you to maintain a word count of 800 to 900 words. I want you to consider the following longtail keywords in the outline: 

Main Keywords/Phrases Supporting Keywords/Phrases
Design changes Variations, modifications, alterations, amendments
Construction project Residential construction, building project, renovation, home improvement
Project delays Timeline delays, construction delays, schedule disruptions
Communication Planning, coordination, collaboration, consultation
Construction contract Building agreement, contract terms, legal obligations
Risk management Minimizing risks, risk mitigation, risk avoidance
Dispute resolution Legal advice, construction lawyer, contract disputes, mediation, arbitration
Budget management Cost control, budget monitoring, cost estimates, pricing
Project scope Design vision, project specifications, work requirements, project goals
Documentation Written record, project logs, change orders, project reports, Construction delays due to design changes
What makes a successful project? 
Construction Project 
Construction Project Management 
Project Management
Design Principle
